name: ConnectedTravelSDK
summary: An official SDK developed by Connected Travel, LLC
description: ConnectedTravelSDK is an SDK intended for real-time trip recording, presence logging, offers analytics, infractions recording, activity reporting, alerts, spatial actions, etc.
